com.squareup.leakcanary

Class RefWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.leakcanary.RefWatcher

  • public final class RefWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Watches references that should become weakly reachable. When the RefWatcher detects that a reference might not be weakly reachable when it should, it triggers the HeapDumper.

    This class is thread-safe: you can call watch(Object) from any thread.

      • watch

        public void watch(java.lang.Object watchedReference)
        Identical to watch(Object, String) with an empty string reference name.
        See Also:
        watch(Object, String)

      • watch

        public void watch(java.lang.Object watchedReference,
         java.lang.String referenceName)
        Watches the provided references and checks if it can be GCed. This method is non blocking, the check is done on the Executor this RefWatcher has been constructed with.
        Parameters:
        referenceName - An logical identifier for the watched object.
